body:
Haven't been in the forums in a long time, haven't been on the server even longer...

From my time here, I can gladly say that I had a good time playing with you guys for however long I used to... joined back in 2013, I believe. Anyway, good luck to all of you in whatever endeavors you have planned for the future and good day :)

Here's some art for ya...
